nodes.text: A battle took place in 21 BBY over the planet Eriadu in the Seswenna sector between the forces of the Confederacy of Independent Systems and the Galactic Republic. The Confederate forces were commanded by the sadistic Kaleesh cyborg General Grievous and during the battle, the Separatist leader Count Dooku received a report that Grievous had slaughtered many clone troopers and that the engagement was faring well for the Separatists.
